original_title: Sesame Street: Firefly Fun and Buggy Buddies
overview: Have you heard the buzz? Join your Sesame Street friends for fun stories and segments all about bugs in Firefly Fun And Buggy Buddies! In our first story, Telly and Baby Bear try to figure out how to catch a firefly. But once they finally do, they realize the little bug seems sad, can they find out why? In another story, Oscar's pet worm Slimey wants to get a pet bug at the Bug-a-Wee Bug Shelter. Nat, a worker at the shelter (played by actress Molly Shannon) helps Slimey choose a special bug, but is it the right one for Slimey?. The dvd also features a favorite Elmo's World episode all about bugs, Jenny McCarthy teaching the word "insect," and Sesame Street's own resident Twiddlebugs trying to identify a caterpillar. Get snug as a bug and light up your summer night with Firefly Fun And Buggy Buddies.
title: Sesame Street: Firefly Fun and Buggy Buddies
